name: Early Grave Redemption
description:
The game can be played in a two players coop mode with a joystick.

A failed experiment in the Mississipi state lead to  a mutant zombies epidemy that quickly started to get out of control. 

The autorities at the Early Grave prision decided to release the most dangerous criminals of the country to hunt the zombies, but with a condition, they should survive a test to prove their value....   and here you are.

Development Team:

  • Felipe Pelissari, character artist
  • Gustavo Haschich, lead game designer and programmer
  • Gabriel Franco, environment artist and sound guy
  • Ícaro Lins, UI artist
